default.defaultTitle: Archetype Original — Servant Leadership for Modern Teams
default.description: Archetype Original helps leaders build sustainable organizations through servant leadership, culture clarity, and proven systems for growth.
default.keywords: servant leadership, leadership consulting, business culture, executive mentorship, fractional leadership, Bart Paden

about.title: About Bart | Archetype Original
about.description: I build leaders worth following. For more than three decades, I’ve helped people and organizations find clarity in the middle of growth, pressure, and change.
about.keywords: Bart Paden, servant leadership, executive mentor, leadership consulting, business culture, Archetype Original

philosophy.title: Philosophy | Archetype Original
philosophy.description: I believe business and leadership are inseparable. Healthy companies grow from healthy people, and healthy people thrive under clear, consistent leadership.
philosophy.keywords: leadership philosophy, servant leadership, business culture, leadership principles, Archetype Original

methods.title: Methods | Archetype Original
methods.description: Every engagement begins with listening. Every business has its own rhythm, and every leader carries unseen weight.
methods.keywords: leadership methods, servant leadership framework, leadership systems, company culture, Archetype Original

what-we-do.title: What We Do | Archetype Original
what-we-do.description: Archetype Original helps leaders and organizations thrive through mentorship, consulting, workshops, and fractional leadership—grounded in 32 years of real-world experience.
what-we-do.keywords: leadership consulting, executive coaching, workshops, fractional leadership, business mentoring, Archetype Original
